error.signature: An error occurred (UserNotConfirmedException) when calling the InitiateAuth operation

verdict.summary: Cognito user exists but hasn't confirmed their email/phone.

dead_ends.why_fails: Loses any associated data; user must re-register

dead_ends.action: Disabling email verification on the user pool
dead_ends.why_fails: Removes a security measure; can't retroactively confirm existing users

workarounds.action: Resend confirmation code: aws cognito-idp resend-confirmation-code --client-id <id> --username <user>
workarounds.how: User receives a new code to confirm their account

workarounds.action: Admin-confirm the user: aws cognito-idp admin-confirm-sign-up --user-pool-id <id> --username <user>
workarounds.how: Bypasses the confirmation flow â€” useful for testing or support

frequently_confused_with.distinction: UserNotConfirmedException means the Cognito user exists but hasn't completed email/phone verification; AccessDenied on AssumeRole means the IAM principal lacks permission to assume the target role
UserNotConfirmedException means a Cognito user hasn't verified their email/phone; NoRegionError means no AWS region was configured in env vars, config file, or code
